hero.title: Custom Wedding Cakes
hero.subtitle: Unique wedding cakes for your dream celebration

intro.title: Your wedding, your cake
intro.text:
Ordering a custom wedding cake is a personal journey. It is the centrepiece of one of the most beautiful days of your life. That is why every wedding cake I create is made to measure, tailored to your taste, theme and wishes. Whether you dream of a classic wedding cake adorned with fresh flowers, a modern fondant-free design, or something entirely unique: together we will create something extraordinary.

As a pastry chef based in Meerkerk, the Netherlands, I work with fresh, premium ingredients and artisan techniques. No fondant or marzipan unless you want it, my wedding cakes are pure, flavourful and beautiful. I deliver custom wedding cakes throughout Utrecht, the Netherlands and beyond.

process.title: From tasting to masterpiece
process.subtitle: How ordering a custom wedding cake works

steps.title: Introduction & tasting
steps.description: We start with a complimentary tasting at my atelier in Meerkerk. You will sample different flavours while we discuss your wishes, theme and budget. The tasting is included in the price of your wedding cake.

steps.title: Custom design
steps.description: Based on our conversation, I create a design that perfectly complements your wedding. I help you think through shapes, flavours, decoration and how the cake fits your overall vision.

steps.title: Handcrafted with love
steps.description: In the days before your wedding, I make the cake entirely fresh. Every layer, every filling, every decoration, all by hand with the finest ingredients.

steps.title: Delivery & setup
steps.description: On the big day, I deliver the wedding cake to your venue and carefully set everything up. You do not have to worry about a thing.

pricing.title: Wedding Cake Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing, no surprises

per_person.label: Custom wedding cake
per_person.description: Including tasting, custom design, fresh ingredients, delivery and setup at your venue. The per-person price depends on the complexity of the design and chosen flavours.

individual.label: Individual pastries
individual.description: Prefer individual pastries as a wedding cake alternative? That is also possible. Think petit fours, mousse cakes or éclairs. Equally festive, but a personal portion for each guest.

pricing.note: I would love to discuss the exact pricing in person. Every cake is unique, and I want to make sure you get exactly what you envision, within your budget.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about wedding cakes

items.question: How far in advance should I order a wedding cake?
items.answer: I recommend getting in touch at least three months before your wedding. During spring and summer season, my schedule fills up quickly. The earlier you contact me, the more date flexibility you will have.

items.question: Can I order a wedding cake without fondant?
items.answer: Absolutely! Most of my wedding cakes are made without fondant and without marzipan. I prefer working with fresh creams, ganache, fruit and edible flowers. The result is not only more beautiful, but above all much more delicious.

items.question: What does a custom wedding cake cost?
items.answer: A custom wedding cake starts at €9.95 per person. The exact price depends on the design, flavours and number of guests. During the tasting, I always discuss costs transparently.

items.question: Can I have a wedding cake with a special theme?
items.answer: That is exactly what I love most! Whether it is a rustic wedding cake, a sleek modern design, or something no one has ever made before: creating a cake that truly reflects who you are is what drives me.

items.question: Do you accommodate allergies?
items.answer: Of course. I can make wedding cakes that are free from nuts, lactose, gluten or other allergens. Please mention this during the tasting so we can ensure a cake everyone can enjoy.

hero.title: About Gijsbert
hero.subtitle: Pastry chef by passion, entrepreneur by conviction

story.title: My story
paragraphs: I am Gijsbert van de Kraats, Gijs to friends, born in 1992 and inseparable from the kitchen since the age of fourteen. What started as a part-time job quickly became a calling. In 2006 I took my first steps in the professional kitchen, and by 2015 I knew for certain: patisserie is my craft.

After years at Van der Valk and Figi, I found my place at Grand Hotel Karel V in Utrecht, where I worked for eight years as head pastry chef. There I learned what it means to perform at the highest level day in, day out. The precision, the creativity, the interplay of flavours and textures. It still drives me every single day.

In 2021 I made the leap to independence. From my atelier at Energieweg 3F in Meerkerk, I now work for a select group of clients: from couples dreaming of the perfect wedding cake, to top hotels that make no compromises on quality. And with the Vijf Heeren cookies, I bring a piece of the Vijfheerenlanden to the rest of the Netherlands.

education.title: Education & Knowledge Sharing
education.text: Alongside my work as a pastry chef, I love passing on my knowledge. I provide masterclasses for professionals and enthusiasts, guest lectures at culinary schools, exam administration and the Basic Pastry training programme. Whether it is a team-building workshop or an in-depth course: I am happy to share my passion.
